other_gear: +1 hide armor, longbow with 20 arrows, mwk sickles (2), cloak of resistance +1, 57 gp
feats: Combat Reflexes, Double Slice, Endurance, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (sickle)

sections.body: In addition to leading squadrons, hobgoblin lieutenants are assigned elite missions that call for stealth—particularly scouting missions and sabotage.

special_qualities: favored terrain (plains +2), hunter's bond (companions), track +2, wild empathy +4
name: Hobgoblin Lieutenant
skills: Acrobatics +5 (+1 when jumping), Climb +9, Intimidate +7, Perception +9, Stealth +12, Survival +9, Swim +9
combat_gear: oils of magic weapon (4), potion of cure moderate wounds, alchemist's fire (2)
